label: Payment Terms
content:
PAYMENT TERMS:
- 50% Downpayment (Initial mobilization)
- 40% Progressive Payment (Upon delivery to site)
- 10% Final Payment (Upon turnover/completion)

label: Kitchen Terms
content:
KITCHEN TERMS:
- 30-45 working days lead time
- Includes basic installation of cabinets
- Excludes appliance installation, plumbing, and electrical works

label: Wardrobe Terms
content:
WARDROBE TERMS:
- 25-30 working days lead time
- Includes internal shelving systems and hanging rods
- Excludes internal LED lighting unless specified in items

label: Exclusions
content:
GENERAL EXCLUSIONS:
- Civil works (Masonry/Breaking of concrete)
- Hauling beyond 2nd floor without service elevator
- Site lighting and power during installation

label: Standard Warranty
content:
WARRANTY:
- 1 year limited warranty on carcass and door workmanship
- Hardwares are subject to manufacturer's warranty policies
